pullRequest.title: Added Unit Tests For Configuration Module
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: zanpizmoht zan.pizmoht@comtrade.com
In this PR unit tests for Configuration module are added.
Related Issue
None
Description of the solution adopted
I added unit tests for all the classes that are in commons/configuration module.

nodes.bodyText: Please add additional tests for DropSchemaObjects method (for now we have default, empty, null and wrong, but we also need some custom strings to be tested).
Please add additional tests for CreateSchemaObjects method (for now we have default, empty, null and wrong, but we also need some custom strings to be tested)
Cna we please try with different objects rather than just Integer?
